en-US.description: Mathematics is the human tool for describing, understanding and revealing the laws of nature in an abstract and logical way, and the language for expressing these laws.

en-US.link: /logic/0 Courses/1 Strengthen basics hypothetical judgment-conjunctive judgment-disjunctive judgment
en-US.description: The Logical Reasoning section assesses candidate's ability to understand, analyze, judge and synthesize various types of information, as well as the logical thinking skills of reasoning, arguing, comparing and evaluating.

The Writing section assesses candidate's ability to construct clear, coherent and persuasive arguments, as well as the demonstrating effective communication skills and critical thinking when dealing with complex business scenarios.

en-US.description: The English section assesses candidates in four parts: cloze, translation, reading comprehension, and writing, focusing on basic reading, writing skills.
